Name: Relish
Description:
Relish is a sweet, sensitive boy with a big heart who's still learning that the world isn’t such a scary place.  Unfamiliar people and loud noises make him nervous—but don’t let that fool you. Beneath that cautious exterior is a playful, loving, affectionate dog just waiting to shine.
He’s making steady progress in building his confidence every day and just needs someone willing to let him go at his own pace.. What helps most? Other dogs! Relish adores canine companions and really comes alive when around doggie friends. He gains so much comfort and courage from having a friendly dog by his side. He also lights up during a game of fetch—it’s his favorite way to bond and burn off energy.
Relish would do best in a calm, patient home with people who understand that trust takes time.
If you’re the kind of person who believes in giving shy dogs a chance to blossom, Relish is ready to reward your patience with a lifetime of love and loyalty.

﻿Relish is approximately 1y 2m 9d old and is fully grown at 44 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Fiona
Description:
Hello! My name is Fiona. I’m a sweet dog who loves to cuddle. I’m a little shy and can be a bit nervous at times. I enjoy treats and long walks. Despite being shy, I’m very loving and am just looking for my forever home and a caring human to call my own.

﻿Fiona is approximately 3y 10m 7d old and is fully grown at 51 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Pippin
Description:
Pippin is blossoming is his new foster home, where he's in a quiet neighborhood outside of the bustling city! He loves to play with his toys and often comes to his foster mom to play with him.  He loves to play outside as well and is pretty good on a leash. He is housebroken, standing by the door when he wants to go out and is trustworthy in the house. He is slow to warm up to new people but with gentle coaxing and treats he is calm although a little standoffish. He loves belly rubs and cuddles. He has a strong prey drive, wanting to run after the squirrels in the neighborhood.  He’s fun to be with and happy when his foster mom comes home. He does well at being alone and we have left him for 8 hours!

﻿Pippin is approximately 1y 9m 19d old and is fully grown at 39 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Bam Bam
Description:
Bam Bam is a 65-pound velcro dog who's convinced he's lap-sized - and honestly, we're not going to be the ones to tell him otherwise.This resilient boy has weathered heartbreak but hasn't lost an ounce of his capacity to love. Bam is the perfect combo of professional napper and tug-of-war champion. Bam is smart,  eager to please, and picks up new routines very quickly.

﻿Bam Bam is approximately 5y 5m 7d old and is fully grown at 65 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Muffin
Description:
Meet Muffin! This adorable lady is ready to find a home of her own for the holidays. Muffin came to Muddy Paws Rescue thru NYCACC after being rescued from a hoarding situation in Brooklyn. But despite her difficult start to life, Muffin has been a brave girl and opened up so much with her fosters. Muffin's favorite thing in the whole world is other dogs. She loves to play with them, snooze near them, and follow them around. Muffin would do best in a home with at least one confident resident dog. She looks to other dogs to show her how to trust humans and during her five months at Muddy Paws Muffin has gone from cowering and refusing to leave her crate to a social happy girl. She greets her humans at the door with a smile and little grunts of joy every time. She potty trained herself and doesn't make a peep inside - we've never heard her bark ever. She needs more time still to fully open up to humans but she'll happily take treats from your hands and has even started allowing butt scritches and pets. All Muffin really wants and needs is a soft clean place to lay, good food to eat, and a canine friend or two. After all Muffin has been through and the bravery she has shown, she deserves her forever home. Could you be it for her?

﻿Muffin is approximately 7y 5m 9d old, approximately 26 pounds, and we estimate their optimal weight to be about 22 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Sugar
Description:
Meet Sugar – a sweet soul with a spunky spirit and a heart full of love

Don’t let my name fool you- I’m more than just sweet. I’m spunky, curious, and full of personality. At 8 years young, I still have plenty of pep in my step for walks, outdoor exploring, and playtime with my favorite humans.

I was born deaf, so I experience the world a little differently, but that doesn’t slow me down one bit. I’m learning sign language (how cool is that?!) and doing great with it, though my foster mom is also teaching me touch signals. What helps me thrive is a calm, structured home with a predictable routine and people who understand that I feel safest when things are steady.

I can get a bit anxious when there’s too much change, but once I know what to expect, I settle right in and show my loving, loyal side. I adore being close to my people- whether it’s curling up on the couch, joining a little adventure, or simply being your shadow.

I’m currently being fostered with both dogs and cats, and I get along beautifully with everyone. I’ve also been around kids and am gentle and patient with them- especially when they offer belly rubs or treats!

And here’s a fun fact: after eight years apart, I was reunited with my birth sister in foster care!

I may not hear when you call me a good girl, but I feel it in my heart every time you show me love. If you’re looking for a gentle, affectionate companion who thrives on routine and will be your loyal best friend through it all, I think we might be the perfect match.

﻿Sugar is approximately 8y 2m 14d old and is fully grown at 35 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Swiper
Description:
Swiper is a very timid little boy that needs a human that is willing to be incredibly patient with him. He can open up given enough time and some furry friends who can show him how to dog. He is still fearful around people right now but has turned into a little cuddle bug with his foster mom and makes a little bit more progress each day. He takes awhile to warm up to new environments and likes to spend a lot of his time in his crate at first, but he'll slowly start exploring and engaging if given his own space to do so. He loves playing and engaging with other dogs (as long as they're close to his size), and he gains confidence from being able to mirror their behavior and learn how to interact with the world, so he would really love a sibling similar in size to himself.

Swiper is still fearful of most humans and will run away or retreat to his crate if they try to pet him, speak to him, or make eye contact. However, over time he's gotten attached to his foster mom and proven that he can be very affectionate, cuddly, and loving with humans if interactions are slow and on his terms.

﻿Swiper is approximately 1y 7m 7d old and is fully grown at 12 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Charles
Description:
Charles is a lil cutie sniffing machine! Even in the first days in a big city, he is a curious pup with big energy. It took him no time at all to warm up to people in our home and explore the neighborhood. Charlie may need slow introductions outside of home because he's initially a little shy but opens up fast! He's smart and really knows what's going on! A very quick learner. Charles will walk up and sniff down anything new. Walking with him is like a scavenger hunt; he'll surely show you where the good spots are. We were so surprised to find that this adult dog, even after days of traveling and relocation, had the energy to zoom all around and all over us! Charlie is just a little bundle of love. We hope he finds a family that can give him all the loving in the world.

﻿Charles is approximately 4y 8m 13d old and is fully grown at 30 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Ernie
Description:
If you’re looking for a goofy, vivacious snuggle bug who will be completely obsessed with you, Ernie is the boy for you!

﻿Ernie is approximately 3y 1m 26d old and is fully grown at 45 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

Name: Affogato
Description:
Affogato is a sweeet goofball as his name indicates! He’s a clumsy couch hippo still learning his size and strength; he has a tendency to knock some furniture over when he gets the zoomies and he tries to be a lap dog at 80 pounds. This boy has SO much love to give and just needs someone to give him some structure and consistency so he knows where to put it :)

He is a HIGH energy dog still learning manners and how to be alone so he can get mouthy and will need someone to give him good enrichment and show him the ropes!

﻿Affogato is approximately 3y 2m 12d old and is fully grown at 76 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Loki
Description:
Loki is a laid back and very sweet boy who enjoys his time lounging around, whether it's on the couch or on you. His play sessions may not last very long but he definitely enjoys a good romp. He's a foodie through and through with the quickest way to his heart being just about any snack.

﻿Loki is approximately 2y 3m 22d old, approximately 74 pounds, and we estimate their optimal weight to be about 46 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Description:
Kilimanjaro (aka Jaro) is a very loving pup. He loves all the attention he can get and will happily stay glued to your hip, whether that’s relaxing on the couch, wrapped up in the sheets in bed, or smelling whatever you’re cooking. He’s really friendly with new people too. He’ll wag his little tail and put his big ears back and greet with kisses anytime somebody comes into the room. 

He’s still a puppy so he has a little work to do with leash training and has the occasional accident inside but he’s food motivated and seems to take well to training so I could see him being perfect with a little bit of patience. Also potty accidents are usually avoided if he’s taken out every couple hours. He’s a great companion and will have an amazing time with somebody who’s ready to give him the love he needs.

﻿Kilimanjaro is approximately 0y 6m 20d old and may be 45 to 65 pounds when fully grown. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Wilbur (bonded with Edna)
Description:
Wilbur will burrow his way into your heart! Wilbur is an absolute lap dog and cuddle-bug, and loves being with you. He's always up for adventure, and down to snuggle. Wilbur is a very happy and affectionate pup that loves giving and receiving kisses. He loves chews, playing fetch, going on walks, and playing with Edna.

﻿Wilbur (bonded with Edna) is approximately 3y 1m 19d old and is fully grown at 9 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Edna (bonded with Wilbur)
Description:
Edna is a super silly and sweet little potato that loves cozying up with you and being affectionate. She is a bit skittish, especially at first, but is growing her confidence! She loves playing tug, fetch (at a shorter distance than Wilbur), and burrowing under blankets and pillows.

﻿Edna (bonded with Wilbur) is approximately 3y 7m 9d old, approximately 10 pounds, and we estimate their optimal weight to be about 8 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Nefertiti
Description:
Hi!  I'm Nefertiti, but you can call me Neffy or Lil' Nefs!

I spend most of my day doing my favorite activity...napping!  While I take my beauty sleep very seriously, I'll happily get up for the important things (like walking and treat time).  Once I have the time to decompress, I'm an easygoing girl who loves being near my people.  A comfy place to snooze and some belly rubs are really all I need.  If you're looking for a clumsy companion to stroll with you, snack with you, and snore with you, I think we'd be a perfect match!

﻿Nefertiti is approximately 11y 2m 1d old and is fully grown at 44 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Hustle
Description:
Hustle has been such a joy to foster! He is the cuddliest little guy! He loves curling up right next to you and will happily nap on your lap for as long as you let him. He’s also great on walks and very easy to redirect if he gets curious about something.

We switched his food to Baby Blue, which he’s been doing really well on. He sleeps straight through the night without any issues and settles down beautifully at bedtime.

Hustle is such a sweet, affectionate, easygoing pup and has been an absolute pleasure to have in my home!

﻿Hustle is approximately 0y 7m 13d old and may be 59 to 71 pounds when fully grown. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Blondie
Description:
Blondie is the sweetest girl you can imagine, and has had a tough road. She just wants to have someone by her side and with her to be close to. Because of her life experiences, it is clear that other dogs and exposure to other dogs are not her favorite thing, and would thrive in a place where she can relax and call her very own. She loves playing little rounds of fetch, loves her little snuffle ball, and loves to cuddle. She has yet to meet a person (adult!) she does not love. She loves her little walks, assuming she doesn't see any other doggies, and just would thrive in a quiet place where she has near constant companionship.

﻿Blondie is approximately 12y 6m 23d old and is fully grown at 13 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Champ
Description:
Champ is an incredibly sweet boy who is eager to please. He walks confidently and with purpose through NYC and is happy to stop and say hello. Champ loves to snuggle and is happy to chill at your feet. He’s a great WFH companion, crate trained, potty trained and is excellent on the leash. He’s a gentle soul looking for another gentle soul.

﻿Champ is approximately 6y 1m 18d old and is fully grown at 42 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Bridgett
Description:
Bridgett is a young, playful, smart and curious dog. She does amazing in her crate and when left alone, and sleeps through the night. It is her safe space. The first couple of days she was  nervous but after a couple of days you can really see her amazing sweet, playful and loving personality develop. 

She is very very intelligent and food motivated and picks up on things very quickly. She is a puller on the leash but it’s because she is nervous outside. She does a lot better on a harness and responds very well to training outside. She is a beautiful dog who would do great with someone who is willing to take the time to train her as she is incredibly responsive and capable. 

She has not shown big interest in other dogs or children, but when other dogs do come up to her to say hi she is such a lady and very friendly. Bridgett just needs someone who will love & commit to her! She is going to be an amazing dog and best friend and is such a sweet and intelligent special girl.

﻿Bridgett is approximately 1y 4m 20d old and is fully grown at 31 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Luke
Description:
Luke is ready to find his best friends! He has so much love to give and wants to be friends with everyone - just at his own pace. Luke has been very gentle with dogs, cats, and has politely observed chickens. His kryptonite is also his superpower! Loud noises, sudden movements, and the like can startle him causing him to bark but it also means that he's a very smart boy and approaches things with caution (read: very, very open to training!). He LOVES play!! Dolls, bones, treats, snow - you name it, he'll happily chase it for his human. 

Luke also loves other dogs and would do really well in a home with a slightly older dog who still has play energy. Currently, Luke is residing with a human toddler and approaches cautiously. Toddlers make lots of noise which can startle Luke but he's being very brave!

﻿Luke is approximately 2y 8m 17d old and is fully grown at 42 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Coconut
Description:
Coconut is just an absolute gem. Lovable, cuddly, and sweet—everyone she meets immediately loves her and people will stop me on the street just to say hi. She loves long walks and exploring her neighborhood (sometimes hard to get her to come back inside, but once she’s in she’s turns into a complete couch potato!). Big fan of belly rubs, a nice long bone to chew for hours or a toy to chase around. She behaves very well on walks, with some light pulling which has improved a ton with her new double leash. She also generally does not get distracted by other dogs or noises on walks (but always on the lookout for squirrels!). A good listener, a best friend and a fun loving spirit. I really can’t say enough good things about this girl. Best of all, she loves the outdoors, whether its rolling around in the grass or just people watching in the park, Coconut could spend her entire day outside.

﻿Coconut is approximately 1y 1m 1d old and is fully grown at 70 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Ellie
Description:
Ellie is an adorable walking oxymoron! Indoors, she is a couch potato who gives her belly to everyone, showing trust and her cuddly tendencies. Outside, she is an energetic ball of energy, wanting to get everywhere as fast as possible. People are not convinced when I tell them she is not a puppy. Ellie loves everyone she meets, and we are working on her excitement level about the many potential dog besties on every block. Pretty convinced this is the first time in her eight years that she has gone places on a leash, but she’s picking it up quickly. I suspect she would make an excellent hiking partner, considering how much she has turned the city into her personal parkour course. The girl can jump!

﻿Ellie is approximately 8y 3m 3d old and is fully grown at 37 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Calua
Description:
Calua is an incredibly sweet and loving older girl who has a heart full of warmth and affection. She's always ready to offer cuddles and and be your shadow. Despite her age, Calua still has a lively spirit and a playful energy. She is a pro at fetch and nibbling at her stuffed toys. She loves to follow you around, always wanting to be near, and her favorite thing in the world is a good belly rub, which she happily soaks up with pure joy. Her curious nature means she’s always interested in what’s going on around her, eager to explore and learn, but she does it all with a gentle and loving demeanor. Calua’s combination of spunk, sweetness, and open-heartedness makes her a truly special companion who brings comfort and happiness to everyone she meets.

﻿Calua is approximately 9y 1m 6d old and is fully grown at 17 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: T Rex
Description:
T Rex (Odette as we call her) is such a smart and sweet pup. She gets so excited to see people and eagerly waits for attention.  While she loves affection she is equally content laying on her own. She has learned to play catch with herself. She will bring the ball on the couch and scoot it off with her nose to jump of and go catch it.  With being as smart as she is and also being food motivated training has been easy.  She takes her blankets and piles them on top of the dog bed to have a very comfy cozy spot to nap.  Her happy, sweet and loving personality with melt your heart. She would be a wonderful addition to any family!

﻿T Rex is approximately 0y 3m 23d old and may be 80 to 100 pounds when fully grown. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

Name: Marigold
Description:
Marigold is a sweet, gentle, beautiful, quiet, independent pup. She is not very food/treat driven and prefers to be outside. She displays the most joy when seeing other dogs. She walks ok on the leash - occasionally pulls when excited. She loves her plush squeaky toys and will bring them to me to play with her.

﻿Marigold is approximately 1y 0m 25d old and is fully grown at 52 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

Name: Cesar
Description:
Cesar - lover of tug of war, pro fetch player, and top tier snuggler. In the way cindy lou who made the Grinch's heart grown 5 times bigger, Cesar has that exact same quality. Cesar melts the hearts of everyone he comes across with his desire for pets, snuggles, and kisses. Cesar's nub says it all went it wiggles with excitement when it's time to cuddle up for bedtime or on the couch. His goofy side really begins to shine when it's play time! With his clumsy limbs accidently bumping the ball out of his reach, he still has the drive to chase after it with a smile. I cannot express enough how Cesar will change your life in the best way possible, and everyone will be envious of your furever cuddle buddy.

﻿Cesar is approximately 8y 2m 11d old and is fully grown at 47.3 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Milk Dud
Description:
Milk Dud aka Dudley is the stubmuffin low rider squishy meatball of your dreams! Poor Dudley was found wandering the cold NYC streets and brought to the city shelter, where he was very fearful, with irritation around his neck and on his legs. Since coming into a foster home, he instantly blossomed into a joyful, goofy, affectionate dumpling. He flops down head first into your lap for belly rubs, grumbles with joy when pet and kissing your face, lifts one ear only when listening carefully, and happily snoozes most of the day away. He is great in his crate, and will sleep for hours when left alone. If you're looking for the ultimate friendly, low energy, indoor-preferred snuggly couch potato this winter, Dudley is your guy!

Dudley arrived to foster recently from his stay at the shelter where he was very fearful, and is working on building his courage walking on the street on leash. He currently does not go on walks on the street, but is comfortable with fosters Brooklyn yard. We are working hard to build his confidence, and he's making progress! He would also do well with a resident dog to show him the ropes.

﻿Milk Dud is approximately 3y 0m 29d old and is fully grown at 42 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is begin the registration process at www.muddypawsrescue.org. If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Harley
Description:
Meet Harley — a sweet, cuddly, affectionate boy who loves being close to his person. He’ll lean into you for snuggles and quiet time and has so much love to give once he feels safe.

He’s a sensitive guy who can be unsure in new situations, so he’ll do best with someone patient and calm who can help him feel safe and supported. With reassurance and consistency, he becomes noticeably more relaxed, trusting, and connected.

If you’re someone who values a gentle, loyal companion and understands the power of patience, Harley will be the perfect match ❤️

﻿Harley is approximately 8y 3m 2d old and is fully grown at 18 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Yoru
Description:
Hi, I’m Yoru, and I’m a #BoroughBred Gentleman! I was found as a stray shortly before Thanksgiving, so not much is known about my past but that hasn’t stopped me from being optimistic about my future!
My foster mom thinks I’m the cutest, sweetest guy who loves to go on walks, meal times, naps and cuddles. My two fur siblings - a small dog and cage-free bunny - don’t mind me one bit either. I’m about 7yrs old and weigh 47lbs, so I’m perfect size for a road trip. Did I mention I love car rides?

﻿Yoru is approximately 7y 0m 7d old and is fully grown at 47 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

If you are already a registered adopter with Muddy Paws Rescue, please email us at adoptionmeetings@muddypawsrescue.org.

Name: Bigsby
Description:
Bigsby is a sweet, goofy boy with a bit of spunk and the perfect amount of energy. This handsome gentleman might be a little shy at first, but not for long, he warms up quickly and he’ll be your most loyal shadow and favorite cuddle buddy! He’s the ultimate lap dog happy to curl up for a nap, lounge on the couch, or keep you company while you work from home. 

Bigsby has the funniest little bursts of playful energy that are impossible not to smile at. He can be a bit of a goofball in the most endearing way! His goofy personality is paired with a clever mind, Bigsby is very smart and loves any kind of food based enrichment. Puzzle feeders, licky mats, kongs - he’s a huge fan of them all and will solve any puzzle in a matter of seconds! He’s got just the right amount of energy to keep things fun, then he’s right back to chillin'. 

When it’s time to get outside, Bigsby enjoys his walks and takes them at an easy pace, appreciating all the sights and smells. He never pulls on leash and walks right by your side the entire time. And when it’s time for treats, Bigsby is always excited for snack time! He LOVES food. He takes his role as “floor-crumb detector” very seriously.

If you’re looking for a wonderful companion who’s equal parts cozy cuddle bug, lighthearted goofball, and smart little sidekick, Bigsby is your guy. He’s ready to find his forever home and shower his new family with love, laughs, and plenty of snuggles!

﻿Bigsby is approximately 8y 1m 2d old and is fully grown at 15 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.

Although our dogs are listed as unknown breed, buildings with specific dog restrictions typically enforce their rules based on what breeds a dog appears to resemble. It's always important to keep that in mind and know your building's policies before adopting a dog.

Name: Brady
Description:
Brady is an absolute angel of a dog. He is so sweet and gentle in the house and loves to be around people. In addition to being an absolute mush, he is also STUNNINGLY HANDSOME and is taking to training well!

﻿Brady is approximately 1y 0m 26d old and is fully grown at 80 pounds. They are microchipped and up to date on all age-appropriate medical care. Their breed is unknown as we have not had a DNA test done.
